description: Definition of constants for Ã–ssur Bionics

categories.name: CHRFLAGS
categories.description: BLE characteristic flags for Bionic Peripherals

categories.name: SRV
categories.description: BLE service id's for Bionic Peripherals

constants.name: BOOL
constants.description: 8 bits, yes=1, no=0, a special integer

constants.name: DATETIME64
constants.description: Datetime, 64 bits, milli seconds since epoc

categories.name: SYSTEM
categories.description: System events and constants for Bionic Peripherals

constants.name: EVENT_WAKE
constants.description: System is a wake after hibernating

constants.name: EVENT_ALLOW_DOWNLOAD
constants.description: Allow download of a new firmware

constants.name: BLE_CONNECTED
constants.description: A client has connected via bluetooth

constants.name: BLE_DISCONNECTED
constants.description: A client has disconnected via bluetooth

constants.name: BLE_CONNECTING
constants.description: A client is trying to connect via bluetooth

constants.name: BATTERY_CHARGING_ERROR
constants.description: Not able to charge due to charging error

constants.name: DEVICE_RESET_REQUEST
constants.description: Expansion board is requesting a reset

constants.name: PACKET_RECEIVE_SUCCESSFUL
constants.description: Expansion board successfully received a packet from main

constants.name: PACKET_RECEIVE_FAIL
constants.description: Expansion board failed to receive a packet from main

constants.name: RW
constants.description: Variable can be read and written to

categories.name: DEVICE_APPS
categories.description: Actual applications runnin on devices.  Used to tag variables, reports and actions supported

constants.name: TOOLBOX_LAST_COMMAND
constants.description: Last command from toolbox to test server

constants.name: TOOLBOX_BULK_TEST_SIZE
constants.description: Number of bytes to send in bulk test

constants.name: TOOLBOX_BULK_BODY_SIZE
constants.description: Number of bytes to send per body in bulk transfer

constants.name: TOOLBOX_SERIAL_TX_PROTOCOL
constants.description: What protocol to use for sending data over serial

constants.name: TOOLBOX_BULKS_PER_BUFFER
constants.description: Number of bytes to send per body in bulk transfer

constants.name: BASE_ACTION_PERFORM
constants.description: flags to indicate what actions shall perform

constants.name: BASE_ACTION_STATUS
constants.description: indicate the action that is being performed and the status

constants.name: BASE_ACTIVITY
constants.description: flags to indicate the current activity of the user, terrain and gait phase

constants.name: BASE_ANGLE_FRONTAL_PLANE
constants.description: Device static angle in frontal plane (up-left)

constants.name: BASE_ANGLE_SAGITTAL_PLANE
constants.description: Device static angle in sagittal plane (forward-up)

constants.name: BASE_ANGLE_TRANSVERSE_PLANE
constants.description: Device static angle in transverse plane (forward-left)

constants.name: BASE_DATE_OF_FIRST_USE
constants.description: time since epoch, min and default times are 10. april 2014 and max is 20 years later

constants.name: BASE_DATE_OF_LAST_RESET
constants.description: time since epoch, min and default times are 10. april 2014 and max is 20 years later

constants.name: BASE_DEVICE_TYPE
constants.description: flags to indicate what device this is

constants.name: BASE_ERROR_STATUS
constants.description: Device error status, combination of all errors

constants.name: BASE_LOGGING_CONFIG
constants.description: flags to indicate what shall be in the debug log

constants.name: BASE_TIME_RTC_DAY_OF_MONTH
constants.description: Real time clock day of the month

constants.name: BASE_TIME_RTC_DAY_OF_WEEK
constants.description: Real time clock day of the week

constants.name: BASE_TIME_RTC_DAY_OF_YEAR
constants.description: Real time clock day of the year

constants.name: BASE_TIME_RTC_SECOND_EPOCH
constants.description: Real time clock since epoch - sec

constants.name: BASE_TIME_RTC_TIMEZONE
constants.description: Timezone, offset from GMT in seconds

constants.name: BASE_TIME_SITTING_SLR
constants.description: User sitting time since last reset

constants.name: BASE_FEEDBACK_MODE
constants.description: Feedback mode options: sound only, vibration only or both

constants.name: BASE_RESET_POR_COUNT
constants.description: Reset count due to POR (power on reset)

constants.name: BASE_RESET_EXT_INT_COUNT
constants.description: Reset count due to external interrupt

constants.name: BASE_RESET_WATCHDOG_COUNT
constants.description: Reset count due to external interrupt

constants.name: BASE_RESET_BROWN_OUT_COUNT
constants.description: Reset count due to brown out

constants.name: BASE_TIME_ON_ACTIVE_RATIO
constants.description: User active versus system on ratio

constants.name: BASE_SENSORY_FEEDBACK_SUBSCRIPTION
constants.description: Sensory feedback subsription to desired sensors [var1][var2][var3]

constants.name: BASE_SENSORY_FEEDBACK_INTERVAL
constants.description: Sensory feedback sent from device with this interval

constants.name: BASE_PROCESSOR_LOAD_TIME_MAX
constants.description: Processor max run time per systick

constants.name: BASE_PROCESSOR_LOAD_TIME_MIN
constants.description: Processor min run time per systick

constants.name: BASE_TIME_RTC_RELATIVE_SECOND_EPOCH
constants.description: Relative real time clock since epoch - sec

constants.name: BASE_COMMUNICATION_STATUS
constants.description: Communication status, 1 data byte is included (0x0 buffer OK, 0x1 buffer 90% full, 0x9 buffer overflow)

constants.name: BASE_COMMUNICATION_TEST
constants.description: Communication test, the device echos the same data back, 14 data bytes can be used for payload.

constants.name: BASE_BIONIC_CONST_VERSION_SECMCU
constants.description: Bionic Const version on secondary MCU chip

constants.description: Socket vacuum, pressure below atmospheric pressure while non-ambulating

constants.description: Max change in vacuum in a single stride

constants.name: LEG_STEP_COUNT_TODAY
constants.description: Total steps since today, since midnight

constants.description: Total steps since the beginning of this week

constants.description: Total steps since the beginning of this month

constants.name: LEG_STEP_COUNT_THIS_YEAR
constants.description: Total steps since the beginning of this year

constants.name: LEG_CADENCE_MAX_PER_DAY
constants.description: Max cadence per day over one year, uint8 array of 366

constants.name: LEG_STRIDE_COUNT_MAX_PER_CHARGE
constants.description: Maximum number of strides for a single battery charge

constants.name: LEG_FORCE_ANTERIOR_2_RAW
constants.description: Load anterior on secondary sensor in sensor units

constants.name: LEG_FORCE_POSTERIOR_2_RAW
constants.description: Load posterior on secondary sensor in sensor units

constants.name: LEG_FORCE_SENSOR_STATUS
constants.description: Status of the ground reaction sensor

constants.name: LEG_GROUND_REACTION_FORCE
constants.description: Measured ground reaction force from all sensors

constants.name: LEG_SHANK_ANGLE_SAGITAL_PLANE
constants.description: Shank angle compared to vertical in sagital plane, positive when ankle anterior to knee

constants.name: LEG_SHANK_ANGLE_ROTATION_WITHIN_PHASE
constants.description: Shank angle progression in sagital plane during gait phase, same orientation as shank angle.

constants.name: LEG_THIGH_ANGLE_IN_SAGITAL_PLANE
constants.description: Thigh angle compared to vertical in sagital plane. Positive when knee anterior to hip.

constants.name: LEG_THIGH_ANGLE_ROTATION_WITHIN_PHASE
constants.description: Thigh angle progression in sagital plane during gait phase. Same orientation as thigh angle.

constants.name: KNEE_EXTENSION_HOLD
constants.description: When turned on, the user can kick the knee into extension after which a lock is activated which prevents the knee from flexing. After 5 seconds, the knee automatically unlocks again

constants.name: KNEE_FLEXION_TARGET_ANGLE
constants.description: The flexion target angle controls the knee flexion angle during the swing phase. Increasing the value means the knee will flex more during walking, decreasing will make the knee flex less.

constants.name: KNEE_ACTUATOR_POSITION
constants.description: Angle of the knee joint actuator from fully extended.

constants.name: KNEE_STANCE_EXTENSION
constants.description: Stance extension controls the prosthetic limb in stance phase and moving in to extension. A higher value means more resistance a lower value less resistance when standing on the knee and extending it.

constants.name: KNEE_STANCE_FLEXION_LEVEL_GROUND
constants.description: Stance flexion (level ground) controls the prosthetic limb in stance phase moving into knee flexion. A higher value means more resistance a lower value less resistance when standing on the knee and flexing it.

constants.name: KNEE_STANCE_FLEXION_STAIRS_AND_RAMPS
constants.description: Stance flexion (stairs) controls the prosthetic limb in stance phase moving into knee flexion when walking on stairs or ramps. A higher value means more resistance a lower value less resistance when walking down stairs.

constants.name: KNEE_SWING_EXTENSION_LEVEL_GROUND
constants.description: Swing extension (level ground) controls how fast the prosthetic knee moves into extension during the swing phase when walking on level ground. A higher value means more resistance and a lower value less resistance when swinging the knee forward

constants.name: KNEE_SWING_EXTENSION_STAIRS_AND_RAMPS
constants.description: Swing extension (stairs) controls how fast the prosthetic knee moves into extension during the swing phase when walking on stairs or ramps. A higher value means more resistance and a lower value less resistance when swinging the knee forward

constants.name: KNEE_SWING_MAXIMUM_FLEXION
constants.description: Control how far into the flexion the knee is able to go while swinging during walking. Higher values indicatie lower resistance (more flexion), lower values higher resistance (less flexion)

constants.name: KNEE_TERMINAL_SWING_POINT
constants.description: When the knee is swinging forward and is almost in full extension additional resistance is applied to facilitate a smooth impact. Terminal swing point controls when this additional resistance is applied. A higher value means the resistance is applied earlier a lower value means it is applied later

constants.name: KNEE_TERMINAL_SWING_RESISTANCE
constants.description: When the knee is swinging forward and is almost in full extension additional resistance is applied to facilitate a smooth impact. The amount of additional resistance is controlled by this parameter. A higer value means more resistance a lower value less resistance

constants.name: KNEE_SWING_INITIATION_MOMENT_POINT
constants.description: Swing initiation from rheologic, slider without values just earlier and later

constants.name: KNEE_AVERAGE_MASS
constants.description: Average mass for standing force activity report

constants.name: KNEE_STABILITY_FEATURE_HOLD_AT_HEELSTRIKE
constants.description: Stability feature setting, hold at heel strike

constants.name: KNEE_STABILITY_FEATURE_HOLD_AT_LIFT
constants.description: Stability feature setting, hold at heel strike

constants.name: KNEE_CT_ANGLE
constants.description: Angle of the compliant transmission associated with the knee joint

constants.name: KNEE_CT_ANGLE_RAW
constants.description: Compliant transmission angle associated with the knee joint in sensor units.

constants.name: KNEE_ACTUATOR_POSITION_RAW
constants.description: Joint actuator angle in sensor units. Zero when joint is fully extended.

constants.description: Applied torque by knee joint actuator.

constants.description: Applied torque by knee joint actuator.

constants.description: The estimated maximum extension torque in stance phase while walking

constants.description: The thigh angle at estimated max extesion torque

constants.description: The estimated velocity of the prostesis center in direction x in global ref frame

constants.description: The estimated velocity of the prostesis center in direction y in global ref frame

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_LIN_POS_EST_Y
constants.description: The estimated verital displacement from mid stance

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_THIGH_ANG_AT_STANCE_FLEX_EST
constants.description: Thigh angle at estimated point of max stance flexion

constants.description: All criterias for toe off assist are met.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_JOINT_ANGLE_FROM_CT
constants.description: Knee joint angle contribution from ct.

constants.description: Rotational velocity of the thigh segment

constants.description: Rotational velocity of the shank segment

constants.description: Rotational velocity of the thigh segment in stance

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_VERT_DISPL_EST
constants.description: Power knee vertical displacement estimate after toe off.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_HORIZ_DISPL_EST
constants.description: Power knee horizontal displacement estimate after toe off.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_STANCE_FLEXION_LEVEL
constants.description: Amount of stance flexion for the knee during walking.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_TOA_TORQUE_LEVEL
constants.description: Amount of unloading before triggering TOA subphase during walking.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_MAX_SWING_FLEXION_ANGLE_WALKING
constants.description: The targeted flexion angle of knee during swing while walking.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_FA_FP_WALKING_SPEED
constants.description: The thigh rotation speed during walking to transition from slow walking to fast walking.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_FA_FP_STEP_LIMIT
constants.description: The min step count meeting speed criteria needed to transition from slow walking to fast walking.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_SDN_TORQUE_LEVEL
constants.description: The min torque level needed to trigger the kne to yield.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_SDN_RESISTANCE_LEVEL
constants.description: The resistance level during sit down activity.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_SUP_ASSISTANCE_LEVEL
constants.description: The assistance level during standing up activity.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_DIS_RESISTANCE_LEVEL
constants.description: The resistance level during stairs down activity.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_DIS_EXT_SPEED
constants.description: The extension speed of the knee in swing during stairs down actiivty.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_RAMP_RESISTANCE_LEVEL
constants.description: The resistance level during ramp descent.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_GEN_ASSISTANCE_LEVEL
constants.description: The assistance level during stair ascent activity.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_GEN_FLEXION_ANGLE
constants.description: The flexion angle of the knee in swing during stair ascent.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_GEN_FOOT_PLACEMENT_ANGLE
constants.description: The foot placement angle of the knee during stair ascent.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_RAMP_TORQUE_LEVEL
constants.description: The flexion torque level needed to get knee to detect ramps.

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_DISABLE_STAIR_ASCENT
constants.description: Enables or disables stair ascent activity

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_AUTO_ADJUSTMENT_STATUS
constants.description: Display the status of the automatic adjustment process

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_AUTO_ADJUSTMENT_VALID_STEPS
constants.description: Display the number of valid steps encountered in the process

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_AUTO_ADJUSTMENT_INVALID_STEPS
constants.description: Display the number of invalid steps encountered in the process

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_AMPUTATION_TYPE
constants.description: States the amputation type of the user

constants.name: POWER_KNEE_IMU_DRIFT_STATUS
constants.description: true when IMU status is unknown

constants.name: RHEO_KNEE_HBDRV_STATUS
constants.description: Status feedback of the H-bridge driver

constants.name: RHEO_KNEE_ACTUATOR_SETPOINT
constants.description: The setpoint for the rheo knee actuator

constants.name: RHEO_KNEE_ACTUATOR_SETPOINT_RAW
constants.description: The setpoint for the rheo knee actuator in mA units

constants.name: RHEO_KNEE_ACTUATOR_DIRECTION
constants.description: The direction for the rheo knee actuator

constants.name: RHEO_KNEE_ACTUATOR_DIRECTION_RAW
constants.description: The direction for the rheo knee actuator

constants.name: RHEO_KNEE_MEASURED_CURRENT

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP1_MAV
constants.description: Send mean absolute value (MAV), to be sent once available depending on the buffer length and overlap parameters.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP1_WFL
constants.description: Send waveform length (WL), to be sent once available depending on the buffer length and overlap parameters.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP1_BUFFER_LENGTH
constants.description: Buffer Length (x10 samples). Valid values are in the range 1..255, e.g. setting this to 20 gives a buffer length of 200 samples.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP1_TRANSMIT_PERIOD
constants.description: Transmit Period (ms). Valid values are in the range 1..255. Note acquisitions are always done on a 1kHz period. The transmit period specifies every nth sample should be transmitted. Note: 0 does the same as 1.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP1_OVERLAP
constants.description: Overlap (%). Valid values are in the range 0..99. Values outside this range will be ignored.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP2_MAV
constants.description: Send mean absolute value (MAV), to be sent once available depending on the buffer length and overlap parameters.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP2_WFL
constants.description: Send waveform length (WL), to be sent once available depending on the buffer length and overlap parameters.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP2_BUFFER_LENGTH
constants.description: Buffer Length (x10 samples). Valid values are in the range 1..255, e.g. setting this to 20 gives a buffer length of 200 samples.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP2_TRANSMIT_PERIOD
constants.description: Transmit Period (ms). Valid values are in the range 1..255. Note acquisitions are always done on a 1kHz period. The transmit period specifies every nth sample should be transmitted. Note: 0 does the same as 1.

constants.name: BSMB_TB_AMP2_OVERLAP
constants.description: Overlap (%). Valid values are in the range 0..99. Values outside this range will be ignored.

constants.name: SENSOR_JOINT_ADCOV
constants.description: The ADCOV bit occurs if the magnetic input field strength is too large for at least one Hall element. This can be the case if the magnet is displaced. Second reason could be that the offset compensation after power up is not finished yet. If this happens some dummy READ ANGLE commands may be sent to settle the offset loop.

constants.name: SENSOR_JOINT_ADDMON
constants.description: Set to high when non existing address is used.

constants.name: SENSOR_JOINT_CLKMON
constants.description: Set to high when the amount of clock cycles is not correct.

constants.name: SENSOR_JOINT_CORDICOV
constants.description: The CORDIC calculates the angle. An error occurs when the input signals of the CORDIC are too large. The internal algorithm fails.

constants.name: SENSOR_JOINT_RANGE
constants.description: The RANGE flag signals that the Hall bias circuit has reached the head room limit. This might occur at the combination of low supply voltage, high temperature and low magnetic field. In this case, manually reducing the AGC setting (Figure 28) can be used to recover a valid Hall biasing condition.

constants.name: SENSOR_JOINT_WOW
constants.description: When a READ ANGLE command is in progress, the WOW flag is set to 1. At the end of the measurement the WOW flag is cleared to 0. Only in case of deadlock the WOW flag is stuck high; in which case a MASTER RESET must be sent to clear the deadlock.

constants.name: STACK_MARGIN
constants.description: Available stack space is less than predefined margin

constants.description: Temperature is out of product?s operational boundary

constants.description: Temperature is too high that the product needs to shutoff to cool down
